member.name: T:Waher.Events.MQTT.MqttEventReceptor
member.summary:
This class handles incoming events from the MQTT network. The default behaviour is to log incoming events to . This behaviour can be overridden by provding an event handler for the event.
The format of XML fragments understood is specified in XEP-0337: http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0337.html

member.name: M:Waher.Events.MQTT.MqttEventReceptor.#ctor(Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient)
member.summary:
This class handles incoming events from the MQTT network. The default behaviour is to log incoming events to . This behaviour can be overridden by provding an event handler for the event.
The format of XML fragments understood is specified in XEP-0337: http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0337.html
member.param: Client on which to receive events from.

member.name: E:Waher.Events.MQTT.MqttEventReceptor.OnEvent
member.summary: Event raised whenever an event has been received. If no event handler is defined, the default action is to log the event to .

member.name: T:Waher.Events.MQTT.MqttEventSink
member.summary:
Event sink sending events to a topic on an MQTT server. Events are sent as XML fragments.
The XML format is specified in XEP-0337: http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0337.html

member.name: M:Waher.Events.MQTT.MqttEventSink.#ctor(System.String,Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Event sink sending events to a topic on an MQTT server. Events are sent as XML fragments.
The XML format is specified in XEP-0337: http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0337.html
member.param: If the client should be maintained connected by the event sink (true), or if the caller is responsible for maintaining the client connected (false).
